tasks.label: Stop: Kill 8000
args: set -euo pipefail; if [ -f .uvicorn_8000.pid ]; then pid=$(cat .uvicorn_8000.pid 2>/dev/null || true); if [ -n "$pid" ]; then kill -TERM "$pid" 2>/dev/null || true; fi; fi; if command -v lsof >/dev/null 2>&1; then pids=$(lsof -tiTCP:8000 -sTCP:LISTEN 2>/dev/null || true); if [ -n "$pids" ]; then kill -TERM $pids 2>/dev/null || true; fi; fi

tasks.label: Proof: Live Search (FDOR)
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_live_search.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_LIVE_SEARCH.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Orange Enrich (OCPA)
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_orange_enrich.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_ORANGE_ENRICH.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Orange Zoning+FLU Filters
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_orange_zoning_flu_filter.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_ORANGE_ZONING_FLU_FILTER.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Orange Parcel Size Filter
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_orange_lot_size_filter.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_ORANGE_LOT_SIZE_FILTER.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Polygon UI (Orange)
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_polygon_ui.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_POLYGON_UI.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Polygon Search (Orange)
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_polygon_search.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_POLYGON_SEARCH.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Polygon Filters (Orange)
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_polygon_filters.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_POLYGON_FILTERS.txt

tasks.label: Git: Restore Proof Artifacts
args: set -euo pipefail; git checkout -- PROOF_POLYGON_UI.txt scripts/prove_polygon_ui.sh; echo; git status --porcelain=v1 && echo && git status

tasks.label: Git: Commit+Push (Final Proofs)
args: set -euo pipefail; git update-index --no-skip-worktree --no-assume-unchanged .vscode/tasks.json PROOF_LIVE_SEARCH.txt PROOF_ORANGE_ENRICH.txt PROOF_ORANGE_LOT_SIZE_FILTER.txt PROOF_ORANGE_ZONING_FLU_FILTER.txt PROOF_POLYGON_FILTERS.txt PROOF_POLYGON_SEARCH.txt PROOF_POLYGON_UI.txt scripts/prove_orange_zoning_flu_filter.sh 2>/dev/null || true; git add scripts/prove_orange_zoning_flu_filter.sh PROOF_LIVE_SEARCH.txt PROOF_ORANGE_ENRICH.txt PROOF_ORANGE_LOT_SIZE_FILTER.txt PROOF_ORANGE_ZONING_FLU_FILTER.txt PROOF_POLYGON_FILTERS.txt PROOF_POLYGON_SEARCH.txt PROOF_POLYGON_UI.txt .vscode/tasks.json; git commit -m "fix: last sale date filters (optional + formats) + debug evidence + stronger proofs"; git push; echo; git --no-pager log -1 --oneline; echo; git status --porcelain=v1 && echo && git status

tasks.label: Git: Commit+Push (Restart+Verify Hygiene)
args: set -euo pipefail; git update-index --no-skip-worktree --no-assume-unchanged .vscode/tasks.json .gitignore scripts/up.sh PROOF_CODE_ENFORCEMENT_ENGINE.txt PROOF_OFFICIAL_RECORDS_ENGINE.txt PROOF_POLYGON_FILTERS.txt PROOF_TAX_COLLECTOR_ENGINE.txt PROOF_TRIGGERS_ENGINE.txt 2>/dev/null || true; git add .vscode/tasks.json .gitignore scripts/up.sh PROOF_CODE_ENFORCEMENT_ENGINE.txt PROOF_OFFICIAL_RECORDS_ENGINE.txt PROOF_POLYGON_FILTERS.txt PROOF_TAX_COLLECTOR_ENGINE.txt PROOF_TRIGGERS_ENGINE.txt; git commit -m "chore: restart+verify reliability (vite) + refresh proofs"; git push; echo; git --no-pager log -1 --oneline; echo; git status --porcelain=v1 && echo && git status

tasks.label: Proof: Triggers Engine
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_triggers_engine.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_TRIGGERS_ENGINE.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Official Records Engine
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_official_records_engine.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_OFFICIAL_RECORDS_ENGINE.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Tax Collector Engine
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_tax_collector_engine.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_TAX_COLLECTOR_ENGINE.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Code Enforcement Engine
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_code_enforcement_engine.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_CODE_ENFORCEMENT_ENGINE.txt

tasks.label: Git: Commit+Push (Permit Trigger Categories)
args: set -euo pipefail; git add .vscode/tasks.json PROOF_TRIGGERS_ENGINE.txt src/florida_property_scraper/triggers/taxonomy.py src/florida_property_scraper/triggers/engine.py src/florida_property_scraper/triggers/connectors/permits_db.py; git commit -m \"feat: categorize permits into tiered trigger types\"; git push; echo; git --no-pager log -1 --oneline; echo; git status --porcelain=v1 && echo && git status

tasks.label: Git: Commit+Push (Tax+Code Connectors)
args: set -euo pipefail; git update-index --no-skip-worktree --no-assume-unchanged .vscode/tasks.json PROOF_TAX_COLLECTOR_ENGINE.txt PROOF_CODE_ENFORCEMENT_ENGINE.txt 2>/dev/null || true; git add .vscode/tasks.json src/florida_property_scraper/storage.py src/florida_property_scraper/triggers/taxonomy.py src/florida_property_scraper/triggers/connectors/__init__.py src/florida_property_scraper/triggers/connectors/tax_collector_stub.py src/florida_property_scraper/triggers/connectors/code_enforcement_stub.py src/florida_property_scraper/triggers/normalization/tax_collector.py src/florida_property_scraper/triggers/normalization/code_enforcement.py tests/test_triggers_engine_tax_collector.py tests/test_triggers_engine_code_enforcement.py scripts/prove_tax_collector_engine.sh scripts/prove_code_enforcement_engine.sh PROOF_TAX_COLLECTOR_ENGINE.txt PROOF_CODE_ENFORCEMENT_ENGINE.txt; git commit -m "feat: tax collector + code enforcement connectors + taxonomy + proofs"; git push; echo; git --no-pager log -1 --oneline; echo; git status --porcelain=v1 && echo && git status
